pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces members of the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following appointments to the National Security and Intelligence Review Agency (NSIRA):

Faisal Mirza becomes a member for a term of five years, effective immediately.

The Honourable Marie-Lucie Morin, P.C. becomes a member for a term of three years, effective immediately.

With full and independent authority, the NSIRA works to ensure that Canadaâ€™s national security agencies are complying with the law and that their actions are reasonable and necessary.

Biographical Notes

  • Faisal Mirza
  • Marie-Lucie Morin, P.C.
